course_title: Environmental Health Seminar: R-based Quant.Data Analysis
class_notes: Topic:  R-based Quantitative Data Analysis for Environmental Health Research.  Only EH department students may enroll until June 21; others may enroll after that date.  Students are required to bring their laptop to class.
course_description: Various topics by GDEH faculty such as Design, Delivery, and Assessment of WASH in Schools; Politics of Public Health; and Public Health Communication of Environmental Justice. Check OPUS/Atlas for current topics and descriptions.
schedule_location: ThF 1pm-2:50pm in Grace Crum Rollins L45
sections: Class Nbr: 3246, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: ThF 1-2:50p, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
